casebody.data:
In the Matter of L.B. No. 7A08. Supreme Court of North Carolina. April 10, 2008. Richard E Jester, for Mother. Matthew Middleton, for Buncombe Co. DSS. Christy E. Wilhelm, for Father.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 11th day of February 2008 by Guardian Ad Litem to Dismiss Petition for Writ of Certiorari:

"Motion Denied by order of the Court in conference this the 10th day of April 2008."
